definition: generic term for cotton or kapok/cotton/padded or quilted with cotton
coat/jacket/short and lined coat or robe

sentences.english: He is very strong and he needn't wear cotton-padded jacket.
sentences.chinese: 他壮实的在冬天不需要穿棉袄。

sentences.english: Her unbuttoned jacket opened to show two huge pendulous breasts.
sentences.chinese: 小棉袄本没扣著，胸前露出一对极长极大的奶来。

sentences.english: I can make this padded jacket do for another winter.
sentences.chinese: 我这件棉袄凑合着还能穿一冬。

sentences.english: Tomorrow is supposed to be mind-numbingly cold . I need to get out my heavy winter jacket.
sentences.chinese: 明天应该非常冷，我需要拿出我的厚棉袄了。

sentences.english: At the back of the wadded jacket and under the elbows there were some mends of another printed cloth.
sentences.chinese: 棉袄的背部和两肘用颜色稍深的花布补着几块补丁。

sentences.english: High-grade fabric jacket for men and women, through water, down-proof handle.
sentences.chinese: 高档男女装棉袄面料，经过防水，防绒处理。

definition: quilted cotton trousers/cotton-padded trousers (worn in winter)
coat/jacket/short and lined coat or robe
coat/jacket/short and lined coat or robe
